Projects

Joystick Controller

A simple joystick webpage to control your robot.

https://talhayranci.com/projects/curio-joystick/

Try It https://curio-joystick.vercel.app/

Teleoperation

Control your robot at a distance from another webpage while streaming the video.

https://talhayranci.com/projects/curio-teleoperation/

Try It https://curio-teleoperation.vercel.app/

Line Following

The simplest self-driving car, demoed on an older version of Curio.

https://github.com/Kirstin813/L4-Individual-Project/tree/main/src#follow-a-black-line

Object Following

Track a red object around, demoed on an older version of Curio.

https://github.com/Kirstin813/L4-Individual-Project/tree/main/src#object-tracking

Voice Control

Give instructions to Curio by talking to it.

https://youtu.be/bdlzn9TVa_s?si=BjacFdQQ5bbN35PV

Virtual Lead

The phone is identifying the position and orientation of Curio, by moving the phone you can control Curio.

https://www.youtube.com/shorts/vm0vGfx4_nk
